name: Youkai Center
description:
Choose between Eirin, Koishi and Yumemi and help some of the youkai (and humans) of Gensokyo with their sickness.

You can either talk, examine or perform actions on the patients to do it. Be careful because if you do it in the wrong way, your patient can die and it's game over.

Programming:  Enalye (@Enalyee), JonathKane, 

Art: Automn' (@automnshin),

Music: Mrnuage,  Enalye (@Enalyee)

BEFORE DOWNLOADING
Launch the game with "thjam3.exe" for Windows

For Linux, the game does not seems to launch by double clicking, idk why, so launch with the terminal : "./thjam3"
